definition: Maori, indigenous Polynesian people of New Zealand

hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])

sentences.english: In addition, the obsidian is sacred to the Maoris.
sentences.chinese: 此外，黑曜石是神圣的毛利人之物。

sentences.english: Maori English is a variety of English used by Maori people.
sentences.chinese: 毛利英语是一种英语变体，为毛利人所使用。

sentences.english: On the other hand, the Treaty of Waitangi and the health of Maori are aspects of nursing practice.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，怀唐伊条约和毛利人的健康护理实践方面。

sentences.english: The common meeting place for Maori is on the marae.
sentences.chinese: 毛利人聚会的地点通常是在露天会场内。

sentences.english: Today there are special kindergartens for Maori children.
sentences.chinese: 今天，有专门为毛利人小孩开办的幼儿园。

sentences.english: Maoris living a traditional life in a modern world.
sentences.chinese: 毛利人在现代世界里过着传统生活。

sentences.english: Much of the compensation has been invested in order to provide educational and health services for members of the iwi.
sentences.chinese: 相当一部分赔偿金用在了毛利人的教育和健康服务。

sentences.english: The native people of New Zealand are called the Maori.
sentences.chinese: 新西兰的原住民被称为毛利人。

sentences.english: Do you know if the Maoris and Europeans are getting on well now?
sentences.chinese: 你知道现在毛利人和欧洲人相处得好吗？

sentences.english: Maori children are taught at an early age what to do when they come to the marae.
sentences.chinese: 毛利小孩在孩童时期就接受在毛利人会场的行为教育。

sentences.english: Today, about 14 per cent of the New Zealand population have Maori ancestory.
sentences.chinese: 今天，新西兰约14%的人口具有毛利人血统。

sentences.english: The Maori signed an agreement with the European settlers.
sentences.chinese: 毛利人和欧洲定居者签署了一项协议。

sentences.english: Mari language is probably undergoing the same type of changing.
sentences.chinese: 毛利人的语言也许也正遭受着同样的改变。

sentences.english: This will be the place where you will meet with the Maoris and join with them in dance.
sentences.chinese: 这将是你会见毛利人并参加一起跳舞的地方。

definition: the Sami people, indigenous people in northern Scandinavia
Ainu (ethnic group of Japan's north and Russia's east)
Inuit (politically correct term for Eskimo 愛斯基摩人|爱斯基摩人)
(Tw) (American) Indian/native American/indigenous peoples of the Americas/also written 印第安[Yin4 di4 an1]
(American) Indian/native American/indigenous peoples of the Americas
